user_query: I want to find inspiration for my next webtoon series by getting a comic recommendation similar to my previous work and creating a meme related to it.

TaskList.description: Analyze the user's previous webtoon work to identify themes, genres, and styles that can guide the recommendation.
Search for a comic that is similar to the user's previous work based on the identified themes and styles.
Retrieve the title and a brief description of the recommended comic.
Generate a meme related to the recommended comic for inspiration.
